snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg attributed the decision to delay the program, which had been scheduled to begin in July, to software programs.
abstract: New York City's much-heralded bike-share program, to be operated by Alta Bicycle Share, is delayed until March 2013, ending weeks of speculation about the fate of a program originally scheduled to launch in the summer of 2012; Mayor Michael R Bloomberg attributes the delay to software issues.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg attributed the decision to delay the program, which had been scheduled to begin in July, to software programs.

headline.seo: New York Bike-Share Program Delayed Until Spring
headline.main: Bike Share Delayed Until Spring, Mayor Says
headline.print_headline: Debut of City’s Bike-Share Program Is Pushed Back to March
